lyrics:

mind over matter
does it matter to any of us
dont change the subject
im heavy on your love
i missed that train
new york city it rains
fly to east la in big jet planes
you know youre on my mind

and if the world dont break
ill be shakin it
cause im a young man after all
and when the seasons change
will you stand by me
cause im a young man built to fall

mind over matter

curtains closed
im watching you this time
